entry.title: A First Post for Testing
entry.content:
Hola, hello!

Some text that goes here. And some more with particular emphasis.

A bullet list? Why not?

  • Item 1
  • Another item
  • One more

Test for an inline equation (can’t have enough of those): $M = \int_0^R \rho(r) dr$

A block of C code:

“`C #include

int main() { int i;

printf("I'm so glad it's back!\n");

return 0; } ```
